main.description: An Obsidian file. Its file path, vault name, and contents are encrypted using a randomly generated passphrase. The rkey is also randomly generated (base58) but unique per-file per-vault.

version.description: A newer version file always overrides an older version file. `undefined` is the lowest version.

metadata.description: The AGE encrypted CBOR record containing file metadata following the FileMetadata interface specification in `src\sync\index.ts`
